0274.HK.summary: China Billion Resources Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration, development, and mining of gold in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. The company operates through Mining Products and Money Lending segments. It also provides money lending services; and trades in coal. The company was formerly known as Global Green Tech Group Limited and changed its name to China Billion Resources Limited in September 2011. China Billion Resources Limited was incorporated 2000 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0340.HK.summary: Tongguan Gold Group Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the exploration, mining, processing, and sale of gold and related products in the People's Republic of China. The company was formerly known as China Mining Resources Group Limited and changed its name to Tongguan Gold Group Limited in April 2018. The company is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

0621.HK.summary: Taung Gold International Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration, development, and mining of gold and related minerals in the Republic of South Africa and Hong Kong. Its flagship projects include the Evander project, which comprises the No. 6 Shaft area and the Twistdraai area on the northeastern limb of the Witwatersrand basin located in the Mpumalanga Province; and the Jeanette project located in the southwest limb of the Witwatersrand basin to the northeast of Welkom in the Free State Province of South Africa. The company also trades in and sells minerals. Taung Gold International Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.

3330.HK.summary: Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in gold mining, smelting, and refining in the People's Republic of China. Its products include gold bullion, silver, copper products, and sulphuric acid. The company has 31 exploration rights, with an area of 289.2 square kilometers, gold reserves and resources of about 39.69 and 92.02 tonnes. It is also involved in the sale of mineral products, machinery, equipment, and components for gold processing; and design of mineral engineering. In addition, the company engages in the sale of metallurgy products and provision of technical services; and production and sale of precious metal products. The company was formerly known as Lingbao Gold Company Ltd. and changed its name to Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd. in May 2017. Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

A2P3.F.summary: China Billion Resources Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration, development, and mining of gold in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. The company operates through Mining Products and Money Lending segments. It also provides money lending services; and trades in coal. The company was formerly known as Global Green Tech Group Limited and changed its name to China Billion Resources Limited in September 2011. China Billion Resources Limited was incorporated 2000 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

GBE.V.summary: Lifestyle Global Brands Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration of gold in West Africa. It owns 100% interest of an exploration permit for the exploration of gold and base metals on the South Morila (Kola) concession, which covers an area of 150 square kilometers located in the Sikasso Region of southern Mali. The company was formerly known as Goldbelt Empires Limited and changed its name to Lifestyle Global Brands Limited in December 2018. Lifestyle Global Brands Limited is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

LI9.F.summary: Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in gold mining, smelting, and refining in the People's Republic of China. Its products include gold bullion, silver, copper products, and sulphuric acid. The company has 31 exploration rights, with an area of 289.2 square kilometers, gold reserves and resources of about 39.69 and 92.02 tonnes. It is also involved in the sale of mineral products, machinery, equipment, and components for gold processing; and design of mineral engineering. In addition, the company engages in the sale of metallurgy products and provision of technical services; and production and sale of precious metal products. The company was formerly known as Lingbao Gold Company Ltd. and changed its name to Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd. in May 2017. Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

VRDR.summary: Verde Resources, Inc. engages in the gold mining business in Malaysia. The company holds interests in the Merapoh gold mine that covers an area of 400 acres located in northern Pahang, Malaysia. Verde Resources, Inc. is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.
